div.div:
Zoltán - August 23, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.0.2
Hot boot got me a black screen, a reboot sound, than nothing... I hoped ...
Hot boot got me a black screen, a reboot sound, than nothing... I hoped it could simple reboot the HTC Sense (what I was looking for). HTC Sensation.

Johnathan - September 10, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.2
Excellent!!
I have been using Quick Boot for awhile on my Evo 4G without issues, and bought Quick Boot Plus to support the Developers.

SK - March 23, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.2
Does not work ad promised, no help from support
paid for the application to get the quick boot option, it does not work on Samsung galaxy s - needs hard reset afterward. Emailed support for help and did not get answer

Koehler - October 1, 2011 - LG Ally with version 1.0.2
Good stuff
Odd. Hot boot takes as long as regular reboot on my Ally, but is blazing fast on my fiance's Ally. Odd indeed. Still great!

Quinton - September 6, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 1.0.2
Great
Bought this months ago but never reviewed. Sickess reboot ever. No complaints at all

ANGEL - September 26, 2011 - HTC Aria with version 1.0.2
Easy and efficient!
No more button pressing for rebooting, turning off, bootloader. Must have for rooted phones. Simple and efficient. Running on Liberated Aria 2.2.2

Doug - June 6, 2011 - Version 1.0.2
I love it but wish it was a standalone app.

PaulQ - May 17, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.0.2
Works well but "hot boot" isn't impressive
On my Droid Incredible, the "hot boot" seems to take almost as long as the regular boot so I don't see the advantage. Otherwise, it handles all of the other tasks well. I like the Tasker plug in for scheduled reboots. (running Cyanogen 7). I would only BUY this to support the developer and get the Tasker plugin.

canezila - May 11, 2011 - Version 1.0.2
It works... but i have killed 2 sdhc cards. It has to be removed. ...
It works... but i have killed 2 sdhc cards. It has to be removed. Too freaking bad. I liked it, but now have a 16g and 8g garbage.

Andy - February 7, 2011 - Version 1.0.2
BS! I bought +, stopped data service, hot boot (why i bought it for) ...
BS! I bought +, stopped data service, hot boot (why i bought it for) did nothing, "non-refundable?" Uninstalling free and + for aggrevation. 0 *s

Larry - December 24, 2010 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.0.2
A must have! Hot Boot & Power Off work with XDAndroid Rhod500. Confirmation screen ...
A must have! Hot Boot & Power Off work with XDAndroid Rhod500. Confirmation screen is great feature. Responsive Developer.

Danny - February 4, 2011 - Version 1.0.2
Power Control Plus wouldn't work without this. Bought both and still didn't work! ...
Power Control Plus wouldn't work without this. Bought both and still didn't work! Both nonrefundable!

John - December 31, 2010 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.0.2
Make sure you really need/want this, it only enables the hot-boot function. ...
Make sure you really need/want this, it only enables the hot-boot function. Uninstalled within 10 minutes but the refund was denied anyway!

CHONG-SEONG - December 24, 2010 - HTC Desire with version 1.0.2
What's difference between "reboot" and "hot boot"? In my htc desire(refleXTsense ...
What's difference between "reboot" and "hot boot"? In my htc desire(refleXTsense 1.5.0 rom), there is no difference. Fix it plz.

Tom - December 24, 2010 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.0.2
Awesome app. Big thanks to the dev.

Jeremy - December 27, 2010 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.2
Been using for over a year, had no issues supporting the developer when I ...
Been using for over a year, had no issues supporting the developer when I saw the plus version. Great app!

Markie - February 16, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 1.0.2
Purchased full version for Hotboot feature. Works perfectly on rooted Desire ...
Purchased full version for Hotboot feature. Works perfectly on rooted Desire Froyo 2.2.

Ananya - August 25, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.0.2
Bought to support the developers. Flawless!

Chuck - January 9, 2011 - Version 1.0.2
Bought exclusively for hot boot, which works great on N1 running CM 6.1.1, Android ...
Bought exclusively for hot boot, which works great on N1 running CM 6.1.1, Android 2.2.1!

Doc - December 25, 2010 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0.2
Excellent app. Works like a charm!

jason - July 30, 2011 - Samsung Europa with version 1.0.2
Nice work dev should be built in as standard ...

bcthunder - May 6, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.2
Make this app stop formatting my sd card and I will use it again.......WTF!

KG6CK - January 26, 2011 - Version 1.0.2
Used to work to soft reboot my Droid X, now locks up my phone ...
Used to work to soft reboot my Droid X, now locks up my phone on "Hot Boot," requiring a hard reboot.

Mark - December 28, 2010 - SEMC Xperia X10 with version 1.0.2
Hotboot locks up phone so you have to remove battery Sony x10 refunded

Terry - July 19, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.0.2
Ns4g. Everything works. I used this app for a long time and decided to ...
Ns4g. Everything works. I used this app for a long time and decided to support the devs.

Carlos - April 21, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.2
When used this app does something to my sd card. OS tells me sd ...
When used this app does something to my sd card. OS tells me sd card is damaged format now. This app sucks.

Michael - September 21, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.0.2
Exactly what I needed ..
Thanks! Nexus S 4G

Harold - February 16, 2011 - Huawei M865 with version 1.0.2
IVE TRIED TO DOWNLOAD IT SEVERAL OF TIMES I WANT MY MONEY BACK YOU ...
IVE TRIED TO DOWNLOAD IT SEVERAL OF TIMES I WANT MY MONEY BACK YOU THIEF

Jeffrey - February 2, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.0.2
Downloads, but won't install.

fire_and_desire2007 - May 23, 2012 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.0.2
Android phone must have!
I use it almost every day on my rooted unlocked phone. Very useful app. Keep the good work going. Be blessed.

Antonio - June 18, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.2
Hotboot locks up Epic.

Leea - January 17, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.0.2
Absolutely awesome and a must have for rooted phones!

Joe - July 9, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 1.0.2
I use this all the time, pro version is worth it. Nice job developers.

KENPO - November 4, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.0.2
Nice work
Work perfect

Matt - February 22, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.2
A must have for root users. Running on Evo 2.2 Mikfroyo 4.5 custom Rom ...
A must have for root users. Running on Evo 2.2 Mikfroyo 4.5 custom Rom BIG thanx to XDA and the DEVS.

Mitchell - February 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.0.2
Great work
One of my favorites

ViperGeek - October 20, 2011 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 1.0.2
Hot Boot no faster than Reboot

Pyxil - February 14, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.2
Anyone who purchases this license key and then give it one star is a ...
Anyone who purchases this license key and then give it one star is a moron. This app is awesome. May need a better looking UI but works like a charm!

Nick - May 27, 2012 - Motorola Droid 3 with version 1.0.2
D3
Root deserves the best.

Salpiche - March 21, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0.2
Works perfet on my HTC EVO 4G, however it does not works on my ...
Works perfet on my HTC EVO 4G, however it does not works on my Samsung Epic 4G

Anonymous - May 11, 2011 - Galaxy Tab 10.1 with version 1.0.2
Flawless.

Works as advertised, Moto Atrix

AndWHUN - April 7, 2011 - Version 1.0.2
Hot Boot!

fernandez.exchange - March 5, 2011 - HTC Nexus One with version 1.0.2
Works as advertised. Tmo G2.

Sami - May 25, 2011 - Version 1.0.2
Perfect.

PUNISHER - March 12, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.0.2
Won't answer emails.

mr-me - January 14, 2011 - Version 1.0.2
Great

m@dsen - January 12, 2011 - Version 1.0.2
Nice :-)

bman - November 29, 2010 - Galaxy Tab 10.1 with version 1.0
awesome integration with tasker, hopefully future versions will support fast ...
awesome integration with tasker, hopefully future versions will support fast boot, but happy to support the devs for this great app

Gregory - December 13, 2010 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.0
Does exactly what it says it does. Works great on my Droid X.

Neil - December 10, 2010 - Version 1.0
Normal boot option works fine, but the hot boot always freezes my X10, have ...
Normal boot option works fine, but the hot boot always freezes my X10, have to remove the battery to reset. Shame :-(

Vince - November 29, 2010 - Droid Bionic with version 1.0
Just made the best boot app better!

shrink57 - November 29, 2010 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.0
Bought this to support developer. Great app.

JeSSie - December 15, 2010 - Version 1.0
Perfection. Rooted HTC Incredible froyo

อท - November 29, 2010 - Version 1.0
What a great app

crachel - November 30, 2010 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.0
Use this all the time..

Nice.
Makes rebooting very easy.

Works great
